author: Amos
description: Leverage a powerful AI tool to spotlight the Koii ecosystem by running the AstroLink task. Help more people discover and join our growing community by engaging with targeted audiences and driving awareness through strategic interactions. A secondary X account is suggested to run this task. Before running the task, please ensure that you visit our discord https://discord.gg/mg3FCNyN and check the detail steps.
migrationDescription: Solve a bug that rewards are not distributed to the runners.

requirementsTags.description: The username of your volunteer Twitter account. Please ensure your volunteer Twitter account has passed the Twitter verification process.
The password of your volunteer Twitter account.
If verification is required, will use your email or phone number to login.
